ValidationRule.description: Shipping adresses should be completed when client accept assesment
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'DistantCareService', OR( ISBLANK(Shipping_Address_Line_1__c), ISBLANK(Shipping_City__c), ISPICKVAL(Shipping_Country__c,''), ISBLANK(Shipping_Zip_Postal_Code__c) ), OR( ISPICKVAL(ICONiCS_Status_Detail__c,'Preliminary Quote Validated'), ISPICKVAL(ICONiCS_Status_Detail__c,'Shipped to Repair Center'), ISPICKVAL(ICONiCS_Status_Detail__c,'Spare parts order preparation'), ISPICKVAL(ICONiCS_Status_Detail__c,'Received in Repair Center'), ISPICKVAL(ICONiCS_Status_Detail__c,'Order pending validation'), ISPICKVAL(ICONiCS_Status_Detail__c,'Order accepted'), ISPICKVAL(ICONiCS_Status_Detail__c,'Waiting for Spare parts'), ISPICKVAL(ICONiCS_Status_Detail__c,'Repair in progress'), ISPICKVAL(ICONiCS_Status_Detail__c,'Repair finalized'), ISPICKVAL(ICONiCS_Status_Detail__c,'Waiting for Payment'), ISPICKVAL(ICONiCS_Status_Detail__c,'Payment Confirmed'), ISPICKVAL(ICONiCS_Status_Detail__c,'Shipped to Client'), ISPICKVAL(ICONiCS_Status_Detail__c,'Delivered to Client'), ISPICKVAL(ICONiCS_Status_Detail__c,'Product stocked') ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The Delivery address section is not complete. Please fulfill the following fields: Shipping Address Line 1, Shipping City, Shipping Country, Shipping Zip/Postal Code.
